title: (4314) Architect Designed Brand New 3 Storied House Available For Sale Thalawatugoda
details: Architect Designed Brand New 3 Storied House Available for Sale in Highly Residential Area, Thalawatugoda, 10 Perches Land extent, 04 Bedrooms, 4 Bathrooms all With Shower Cubicles, Toto fittings and Granite tops. 3 Phase electricity, Pipeline Water With overhead Tank, Hot Water- 02 Pantries, Pantry Cupboards With Granite tops Remote Control Gate Parking for 3 Vehicles Servant Room and Bathrooms front and back Landscape Garden. Rs : 365 Negotiable 36.5 Million
